com.netflix.msl.msg
Class SecretMessageContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.msg.SecretMessageContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageContext
public abstract class SecretMessageContext
extends Object
implements MessageContext

A message context implementation that can be extended for use with messages that have secret contents which must be protected from the view of unauthorized parties. The contents will be encrypted and integrity protected but still replayable.

Most messages should be considered secret messages. Examples would private conversations between individuals or the transmission of personal information.

isNonReplayable

public boolean isNonReplayable()
Description copied from interface: MessageContext

Called to determine if a message should be marked as non-replayable.

Trusted network servers must always return false.

Specified by:
isNonReplayable in interface MessageContext
Returns:
true if the application data should not be carried in a replayable message.
